items.title: Everton's Gueye sent off for clash with team-mate Keane
items.description: Everton's Idrissa Gana Gueye is sent off for clashing with team-mate Michael Keane during the Premier League match at Manchester United.

items.title: Five key moments after MPs question top BBC figures
items.description: BBC chairman Samir Shah, alongside board members and former advisers, appears before MPs after the resignation of Tim Davie.

items.title: Farage says he's 'never directly racially abused anybody' after school racism claims
items.description: The Reform UK leader was responding to reports he made racist remarks to his peers in school in the 1970s.

items.title: Council votes to change street named after former prince
items.description: Councillors in Mid and East Antrim have voted to change the name of a road called Prince Andrew Way in Carrickfergus.

items.title: Zelensky warns against giving away territory as latest Ukraine talks end
items.description: There was optimism following the talks in Geneva, but no details emerged on how to bridge the huge divide between Moscow and Kyiv over territory and s...
